Header.title: PDFmate.AI
Header.paragraph: PDFmate.AI is your personalized AI research assistant powered by Llama 3.1, one of the most advanced models available.

Features.title: Seamless PDF Ingestion
Features.text: Effortlessly upload and extract content from PDFs while preserving their structure and context.

Features.title: Smart Question Suggestion Engine
Features.text: Discover insightful questions generated automatically to guide your exploration of the document.

Features.title: Natural Language Query Interface
Features.text: Ask questions in plain language and receive precise, context-aware answers from your PDFs.

Features.title: Citation and Validation Mechanism
Features.text: Ensure accuracy with clear citations that trace responses back to specific sections of your documents.
